Html: The Microsoft Download Centre seems to be serving up the 0.8.0.msi when clicking on the download of the 0.9.0.msi ?

We made a change towards the end of last week where the 0.9.0 msi is the only one available through the download link (though you can still reach the previous versions at the bottom of the download page). Are you saying that for you, when you click the red Download button the msi you get is the 0.8.0 one? It used to pop up a list of versions, but now should just serve up the 0.9.0 without any list.

Hi jonturner,
This seems to have been fixed now.
Many thanks.
